==German== ===Etymology=== {{suffix|de|Eile|ig}} ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|de|/ˈʔaɪ̯lɪç/}} ===Adjective=== {{de-adj|er|sten}} # [[speedy]], [[hasty]] #: {{ux|de|eine '''eilige''' Abreise|t=a hasty departure|inline=1}} #: {{ux|de|eine '''eilige''' Flucht|t=a hasty flight|inline=1}} # [[urgent]] #: {{ux|de|Ist es '''eilig'''?|t=Is it urgent?|inline=1}} #: {{ux|de|eine '''eilige''' Nachricht|t=an urgent message|inline=1}} #: {{ux|de|es '''eilig''' haben|t=to be in a hurry, to be in a rush|inline=1}} #: {{ux|de|Er hat es '''eilig'''.|t=He is in a hurry.|inline=1}} ====Declension==== {{de-decl-adj|eilig|eiliger|eiligst}} ====Synonyms==== * {{sense|"speedy"}} {{l|de|schnell}}, {{l|de|rasch}}, {{l|de|hastig}} * {{sense|"urgent"}} {{l|de|dringend}}, {{l|de|vordringlich}}, {{l|de|unaufschiebbar}} ===Further reading=== * {{R:Duden}}
